./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_arb_fixed.v Cov: 100% 

   1: // MBT 5-22-2016
   2: // fixed priority arbitration unit
   3: //
   4: //
   5: 
   6: module bsg_arb_fixed #(parameter     inputs_p = "inv"
   7:                        , parameter lo_to_hi_p = "inv")
   8:    ( input ready_i
   9:      , input  [inputs_p-1:0] reqs_i
  10:      , output [inputs_p-1:0] grants_o
  11:      );
  12: 
  13:    logic [inputs_p-1:0] grants_unmasked_lo;
  14: 
  15:    bsg_priority_encode_one_hot_out #(.width_p    (inputs_p)
  16:                                      ,.lo_to_hi_p(lo_to_hi_p)
  17:                                      ) enc
  18:      (.i ( reqs_i            )
  19:       ,.o( grants_unmasked_lo)
  20:       );
  21: 
  22:    // mask with ready bits
  23:    assign grants_o = grants_unmasked_lo & { (inputs_p) { ready_i } };
  24: 
  25: endmodule
  26:
